member.shortcv: Despina Angelaki holds a Diploma in Applied Sciences from the National Technical University of Athens. She was awarded a MSc in Applied Physics from the University of Orsay (Paris - France), supported by the Eugenides Foundation Scholarship. She worked for the European Commission's Directorate General for Research - Transports Directorate, Aeronautics Unit - in the scientific management and monitoring of research projects funded under the FP7. Currently she is working for the Wireless Research Center of the IST Lab at the Department of Management Science and Technology of the Athens University of Economics and Business.
